Articles.Content:
I just re-installed KSP on a new computer and installed a bunch of mods through CKAN and I am running into a problem where all the buttons stop working after a flight.

The main menu pops up and the settings still open but quit to main menu doesn't work.

Launch / leave facility etc also stop working.

If I do a career after the flight all the unresearched parts will also be visible if i hop straight into the hangar.

I saw another thread with a similar issue where MiniAVC was the cause so I renamed that dll in the one mod that had it. (Interstellar fuel switch core had it) but that didn't change anything and after juggling mods for a little I came here again D:

 

Log:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ljmgiurzkyrndna/KSP.log?dl=0

 

Anyone any ideas ?

Edited April 3, 2020 by Conz

There are a few exceptions in your log which seem to be related to your CommNet mods, also this error message: 

[ERR 16:16:03.486] [CommNet Constellation] Error: CNCCommNetScenario - Conflict with third-party CommNet mod(s)! Please remove this or other mod(s)

I see, you have CommNet Manager installed which is supposed to make multiple CommNet mods to play together but maybe it doesn't work in this case. I would suggest to remove the CommNet mods at least for testing purposes and see if that fixes your issue.

Don't forget to create a backup of your savegame or create a new one for testing

Edited April 4, 2020 by 4x4cheesecake

On 4/3/2020 at 5:01 PM, Conz said:

Log:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ljmgiurzkyrndna/KSP.log?dl=0

Public Service Announcement:

If you change the ?dl= parameter in Dropbox links to =1, the person wanting to view or download (what "dl" stands for in this case) doesn't have to go through Dropbox's web site, but instead the download happens immediately.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ljmgiurzkyrndna/KSP.log?dl=1

hth
